General.Name: Ecovacs Robotics Co Ltd
General.Description: Ecovacs Robotics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, and sale of robotic products. Its products include DEEBOT, a floor-cleaning robot; WINBOT, a window-cleaning robot; ATMOBOT, a mobile air-purifier robot; and BENEBOT, a business service assistance robot. The company also offers robot products for home floor cleaning and environmental health; and accessories, such as auto-empty stations, charging docks, cleaning pads, and mopping pads under the Ecovacs brand, as well as smart home appliance products under the Timco brand. The company has operations in China, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Sosi, Nordic countries, the United Kingdom, Poland, NLBE, the United States, South Korea, Thailand, Singapore, and Japan. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.
